structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth

law.catch_line: Chemistâ€™S Analysis For Presence Of Sperm Cells; Certificate Of Results; Prima Facie Evidence
law.text: A certificate by a chemist of the department of the result of analysis made by him for the presence of a sperm cell or cells or seminal fluid on or in any material or substance furnished him by a police officer of any department, signed and sworn to by such chemist, shall be prima facie evidence of the presence of a sperm cell or cells or seminal fluid on or in such material or substance.
